company

Class companyInit

  • java.lang.Object
    • company.companyInit

  • public class companyInit
extends java.lang.Object
    For the company class the singleton design pattern was been used, and company objects was created based on this class by the function getCompany

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Atrade()
      Singleton pattern was been used to create trading function, especially when print all details of trading process Trading as company A, all depots from company A trade B and C with B depots and C depots
      void Btrade()
      Trading as company B, all depots from company B trade A and C with A depots and C depots
      void createADepots()
      Create depots and save depots into A array list Once the process finished print out all depots on console for loop been used to create and save depots
      void createBDepots()
      Create depots and save depots into B array list Once the process finished print out all depots on console for loop been used to create and save depots
      void createCDepots()
      Create depots and save depots into C array list Once the process finished print out all depots on console for loop been used to create and save depots
      void Ctrade()
      Trading as company C, all depots from company C trade A and B with A depots and B depots
      static companyInit getComapny()
      initialization of company and return company object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        the object of company

      • createADepots

        public void createADepots()
        Create depots and save depots into A array list Once the process finished print out all depots on console for loop been used to create and save depots

      • createCDepots

        public void createCDepots()

      • Atrade

        public void Atrade()
        Singleton pattern was been used to create trading function, especially when print all details of trading process Trading as company A, all depots from company A trade B and C with B depots and C depots

        For the trading, using iterator(for loop) to make all depots inside the array list to involve the trading process, if statement plus for loop to check target depot has enough goods to trade or not, as well as cash allowance

        Example if depotB0 don't have enough stock the jump to B1, same as depotCs When the total cost of trading more than depot cash allowance the program will re-generate the amount of B and C product to match with A Depot's cash allowance Once everything done, trading succeed and print details on console, jump to next depot

      • Btrade

        public void Btrade()
        Trading as company B, all depots from company B trade A and C with A depots and C depots

        For the trading, using iterator(for loop) to make all depots inside the array list to involve the trading process, if statement plus for loop to check target depot has enough goods to trade or not, as well as cash allowance

        Example if depotA0 don't have enough stock the jump to A1, same as depotCs When the total cost of trading more than depot cash allowance the program will re-generate the amount of A and C product to match with B Depot's cash allowance Once everything done, trading succeed and print details on console, jump to next depot

      • Ctrade

        public void Ctrade()
        Trading as company C, all depots from company C trade A and B with A depots and B depots

        For the trading, using iterator(for loop) to make all depots inside the array list to involve the trading process, if statement plus for loop to check target depot has enough goods to trade or not, as well as cash allowance

        Example if depotA0 don't have enough stock the jump to A1, same as depotBs When the total cost of trading more than depot cash allowance the program will re-generate the amount of A and B product to match with C Depot's cash allowance Once everything done, trading succeed and print details on console, jump to next depot
